unnormalised: Saonom ko! Cholo mit' marang ar sachi katha bapare re bon galmaraoa: Riniyubol Enarji. Am' do bam' baḍaea, noa do aapnah disom do sukhi ar sasto do dohoae'a, purana jiwan-jelon tel (fossil fuels) lekha do bang. Mund haa: Rajasthan re suruj enarji plat (solar panels) do chaka chokao, Tamil Nadu darha (coast) re hawa chak (windmills) do ghurau, ar Ganga nadi re saktih do hidrolik enarji (hydroelectric power) lekha. Noa sab' do Bharat re do hoh ohkanah.

unnormalised: Saonom ko do disom ritu badlao (climate change) bapare re khabor do bon nel akada. Noa do dur samasya do bang kana; noa do nendah bon chadao akana, sorosom barasa (monsoon) reah dhara khon hawa tak, jaahaa do bon sasej (breathe) aa. Menkhan, mit' marang khabor do: noa do chikan reah saktih do bon tahen.

unnormalised: TERI (The Energy and Resources Institute) lekha sanstha do Riniyubol Enarji bapare re noa-noa samadhan (innovative solutions) do khoj ar lagoo re do pahil re do tinah. Gramin ato re biogas plant khon marang-marang suruj enarji khet (solar farms) tak, noa do aapnah do mit' saph bhabisyot barabar do bona. Ar noa do marang-marang kampani do bang kana; disom reah samudah (local communities) do Riniyubol Enarji do bon chadao akana, suruj enarji koparativ (solar cooperatives) do bon bhenao akana ar enarji rokhia (energy conservation) do bon bhenao akana.
